heroes.trivia: The Spot-Spotted-Salamander is a unique hero with many secrets.

heroes.powers: A sugar glider who can generate a kinetic energy field that surrounds him in colorful, bouncing bubbles. He can absorb and redirect impact, making him a living, ricocheting pinball of justice.
heroes.origin: A lab accident at a research facility gave him his strange and bubbly powers. He is the founding member of the New Warri-ors.
heroes.trivia: Speedball-Sugar-Glider is a unique hero with many secrets.

heroes.powers: No superpowers. He is a skilled martial artist and tactician who uses his vast inheritance to fund a vigilante crusade, complete with high-tech armor and a weaponized skateboard.
heroes.origin: His wealthy parents were killed in front of him, inspiring him to wage a one-bird war on crime. He founded and leads the New Warri-ors, a team of young heroes.
heroes.trivia: Night-Thrasher-Thrush is a unique hero with many secrets.

heroes.powers: A quail who wears the Quantum Bands, powerful alien artifacts that allow him to manipulate energy and create constructs of solid light. He is the designated Protector of the Universe.
heroes.origin: A S.H.I.E.L.D. agent quail who was deemed to have the perfect, non-aggressive temperament to wield the incredibly powerful Quantum Bands. He is a cosmic hero of the highest order.
heroes.trivia: Quasar-Quail is a unique hero with many secrets.

heroes.powers: For all intents and purposes, he is this universe's Superman. Super-strength, flight, heat vision ("atomic vision"), and near-invulnerability. He is powered by cosmic radiation.
heroes.origin: The last survivor of a race of Eternals from a dying world. He was sent to Earth as a baby and raised by human parents. He is the leader of the Squadron Supreme.
heroes.trivia: Hyperion-Hippo is a unique hero with many secrets.

heroes.powers: A wealthy hawk who uses his fortune to fight crime with gadgets and advanced technology, primarily at night. He has no powers but is an expert combatant and strategist.
heroes.origin: The son of wealthy parents who chose to become a vigilante. He is this universe's Batman and a core member of the Squadron Supreme.
heroes.trivia: Nighthawk-Night-Hawk is a unique hero with many secrets.

heroes.powers: A Utopian poodle with superhuman strength, speed, and durability. She wields an unbreakable, transparent shield and is a master of her people's advanced martial arts.
heroes.origin: A member of the utopian society that lived on an island paradise. She is this universe's Wonder Woman and a member of the Squadron Supreme.
heroes.trivia: Power Princess-Poodle is a unique hero with many secrets.

heroes.powers: A whippet with the power of super-speed, gained from exposure to the strange mists from a mysterious source. He is this universe's Flash.
heroes.origin: He gained his powers by accident and decided to use them to fight crime. He is the resident speedster of the Squadron Supreme.
heroes.trivia: The Whizzer-Whippet is a unique hero with many secrets.

heroes.powers: A spectacled bear who wields the Power Prism, an alien gem that allows him to create powerful constructs out of solid light, limited only by his imagination and willpower.
heroes.origin: He was given the Power Prism by a dying alien and became this universe's Green Lantern. He is a member of the Squadron Supreme.
heroes.trivia: Doctor Spectrum-Spectacled-Bear is a unique hero with many secrets.

heroes.powers: A nigh-omnipotent being from another dimension. He can warp reality on a cosmic scale with a mere thought. He is curious, childish, and incredibly powerful.
heroes.origin: He became aware of the Marvel Animal Universe and, fascinated by the concept of heroes and villains, created a planet called "Battleworld" and transported dozens of them there to watch them fight for his amusement.
heroes.trivia: The Beyonder-Beetle is a unique hero with many secrets.

heroes.powers: A timid laboratory mole who gained the ability to mentally control all matter and energy down to a molecular level, making him potentially the most powerful being in the universe.
heroes.origin: A freak lab accident gave this meek mole god-like powers. He suffers from severe confidence issues, which is the only thing stopping him from blinking the entire universe out of existence.
heroes.trivia: Molecule Man-Mole is a unique hero with many secrets.

heroes.powers: A small spider who was given superhuman strength and durability by Dr. Doom-Duck, making her one of the strongest females in the universe. She loves to fight and cause destruction.
heroes.origin: A scrawny, picked-on spider who was offered the chance for power during the first Secret Wars. She happily accepted and became the super-strong villainess Titania, a frequent foe of She-Hulk Sheep.
heroes.trivia: Titania-Tarantula is a unique hero with many secrets.

heroes.powers: A vole who was given the ability to transform into a being of molten plasma by Dr. Doom-Duck. She can project powerful blasts of fire and heat.
heroes.origin: Along with her friend Titania-Tarantula, she was a normal rodent transported to Battleworld and offered superpowers by Dr. Doom-Duck. She is less villainous than her friend and has a long-running romance with Molecule Man-Mole.
heroes.trivia: Volcana-Vole is a unique hero with many secrets.

heroes.powers: A being of pure, solidified sound with a clam's body. He can create powerful sonic blasts and solid-sound constructs. His prosthetic sound-emitter replaces his missing... pearl.
heroes.origin: Origin unknown
heroes.trivia: Klaw-the-Clam is a unique hero with many secrets.
heroes.hero_inspiration: An physicist who stole Vibranium from Wakitty and was transformed into a sound-being. He is the arch-nemesis of Black Panther Paws.

heroes.powers: The leader of the Jabari gorilla tribe in Wakitty. He gains superhuman strength by consuming the flesh of a sacred white gorilla (which is awkward). He is a powerful warrior and a rival to the throne.
heroes.origin: He is the formidable leader of a Wakitty tribe that rejects the nation's reliance on technology and worships the Gorilla God. He is a fierce traditionalist and a reluctant ally of Black Panther Paws.
heroes.trivia: Man-Ape-Ape is a unique hero with many secrets.

heroes.powers: An expert tactician and fighter from Wakitty who mirrors all of Black Panther Paws' abilities. He wears a ritualistically scarred catfish body and a golden variant of the Panther Paws suit.
heroes.origin: The son of a disgraced Wakitty royal, he grew up outside the kingdom and plotted his return. He seeks to take the throne and use Wakitty's resources to conquer the world's oceans.
heroes.trivia: Killmonger-Catfish is a unique hero with many secrets.

heroes.powers: The greatest warrior in Wakitty. She has no superpowers but is a master of every form of combat and wields a Vibranium spear with unmatched skill. Fiercely loyal to the throne.
heroes.origin: The head of the Dora Milaje, the all-female royal bodyguards of Wakitty. Her loyalty to Black Panther Paws and her country is absolute.
heroes.trivia: Okoye-Okapi is a unique hero with many secrets.

heroes.powers: A shrew with a genius-level intellect that surpasses even Tony Stark-Beak's. She is the lead scientist of the Wakitty Design Group, responsible for all of its incredible technology, including Black Panther Paws' suit.
heroes.origin: The younger sister of T'Challa Whisker-Wakanda. She is a brilliant, witty inventor who loves to design new gadgets and tease her older brother.
heroes.trivia: Shuri-Shrew is a unique hero with many secrets.
